McDonalds offers healthy alternative

Advertisement

Students seeking a healthy alternative to a burger and fries may soon be able to go to McDonalds for a nutritious meal PERIOD

Last week the restaurant chain began offering a happy meal for adults in  centralIndiana stores PERIOD

The Go Active Meal which costs . includes a choice of  types of salad bottled water or fountain drink a booklet on nutrition by exercise physiologist Bob Greene and a pedometer said Bill Whitman a McDonalds spokesman PERIOD

McDonalds teamed up with Greene  Oprah Winfreys personal trainer  to help give its image on food and nutrition a facelift Whitman said PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

It is key to pay attention to which salad toppings are higher in nutritional value said Barbara Rolls Penn State professor of nutrition PERIOD

Though salads can be a healthy choice it is important to watch for the types and amounts of dressing that come with them PERIOD Because customers can choose to have fried or grilled chicken with a salad they should be aware of the healthier choice she added PERIOD

 Rolls said PERIOD

Despite her reservations about assuming salads are automatically healthy Rolls applauded the actions taken by the fastfood chain PERIOD Promoting salads and physical activity is a step forward for the fastfood industry she said PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

The introduction of this new healthy product is part of McDonalds effort to provide a superior restaurant experience for its customers Whitman said PERIOD

The Go Active Meal is one of many changes taking place in the company along with improving quality of products dcor and hospitality he added PERIOD

Despite McDonalds efforts to alter its image to the public some students have not been convinced PERIOD

 Nicole Politi seniorEnglish said PERIOD 

Other students regard McDonalds attempts as vain PERIOD

 Jon Ritter juniormechanical engineering said PERIOD

Some other students said they would like to see McDonalds try and cut some fat out of its other menu items PERIOD

 Regina Perry juniormeteorology said PERIOD

Depending on the success of the new product in the Midwest McDonalds may offer the Go Active Meal in more locations across the nation Whitman said PERIOD  he said PERIOD
